RuleSet
          A RuleSet is a container of rules
SSP
          SEARCH SPACE We borrow the term Search Space from AI, where it is a tool for solving a problem In query optimization the problem is to find the cheapest plan for a given query subject to certain context (class Context).
Task
          A task is an activity within the search process.
Tracer
          A tracer object handles tracing events from the optimizer
Winner
          Winner The key idea of dynamic programming/memoization is to save the results of searches for future use.
